snippet: Sergei Kolesnikov became a prosperous businessman and part of the crony capitalist web surrounding Vladimir V. Putin. Now he is waging a risky campaign to expose corruption.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Russian whistle-blower Sergei Kolesnikov, who became a prosperous businessman after the fall of the Soviet Union and became part of the crony capitalist web surrounding Prime Min Vladimir V Putin; Kolesnikov now works to expose what he believes to be the defining corruption of the Putin era.
lead_paragraph: Sergei Kolesnikov became a prosperous businessman and part of the crony capitalist web surrounding Vladimir V. Putin. Now he is waging a risky campaign to expose corruption.

headline.seo: Sergei Kolesnikov Aims to Expose Corruption of Putin Era
headline.main: From Success at Putin’s Side to Exposing Corruption
headline.print_headline: From Success at Putin’s Side to Exposing Corruption
